last_episode_to_air.name: The Future Is Yours
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's Mark's birthday and to celebrate it, Mark, Song Li, Mary and the Professor go to a soccer ground where an FA cup was won and where the cup still stays. Tyrone Lewis is a boy can tell the future and he senses that Mark and Song Li will steal the cup. But Mark and Song Li aren't going to steal the cup. Someone else is, and to find out, Tyrone must change the future that he sensed.

name: Powers
overview: Two teens with special powers solve mysteries: Mark has the ability to read minds, while Song Li has the ability to read feelings. They are in a project run by Professor Henry Powers, who experiments with kids with special powers like the ones Mark and Song Li have. The professor's first experiment was Dr. Mary Holland, who helps Mark and Song Li solve the mysteries with Professor Powers.

episodes.name: New Kid in Town
episodes.overview: A teenage girl called Song Li believes that a ghost is following her, so the Powers team, including Mark and Dr. Mary Holland, go to investigate. The team learn that Song Li is causing these ghostly disturbances, and Mark discovers that Song Li is a teenager with special powers like him.

episodes.name: Missing
episodes.overview: After a man goes missing, the Powers team are sent in to investigate. In Song Li's first case, she discovers that the missing man was sent back in time to save his grandfather. But how will they bring him out of the time hole, and back to the present day?

episodes.name: Shade in the Stone
episodes.overview: Evan Foster and Henry Ford dig up an ancient silver goblet in Henry's backyard. Evan also spots an amulet, and decides to secretly keep it himself. But the amulet begins to take Evan over, and the Powers team are sent in to pick up any clues as to why Evan has been acting strangely. The team discover that Evan has to put the amulet back together with the goblet and bury them, with bones also dug up in Henry's backyard, in the exact same spot they were dug up in!

episodes.name: We Are Not Alone
episodes.overview: A girl is arrested after trespassing on the land surrounding the huge medical centre where she is kept captive under maximum security. Mark and Song Li learn that the girl is an extra-terrestrial who wants to return home. Her ship lost fuel during their journey through space, and they landed on Earth to collect their fuel, which is water. They wanted to land in the ocean, but they accidentally landed near the medical centre. The girl (Lex) wants to go back to the ship to go back to her home town. So Mark and Song Li try to help her escape.

episodes.name: Land of Nod
episodes.overview: A girl called Erin begins to have dreams about an old lady and an old man who play with her and dance with her. But when the old man shows Erin a picture, the elders get angry and storm out of the room. The Powers team are sent in to investigate, and Song Li will have to go into Erin's dreams and figure out why Erin has been having these strange dreams.

episodes.name: Things That Go Bump
episodes.overview: The Powers team are sent to investigate the disappearance of a teenage girl who ran away from an orphanage just before her sixteenth birthday. But strange things begin to happen in the orphanage that make Mark and Song Li unable to control their powers. Who is blocking them out? Could it be the ghost of the girl who disappeared?

episodes.name: Is There Anybody Out There?
episodes.overview: A man goes missing in a small village and it is believed that he was abducted by aliens because of bright lights that appeared where the man was walking to. Everyone in the village saw the lights except the Cargills, a strange family who were staying in the town for only a few days. Could they have anything to do with the alien abduction or will it all be a made-up story?

episodes.name: I'll Be Watching You
episodes.overview: A teenage boy (Ian) is afraid of heights, but when he believes that he has a guardian angel, Mark is sent to investigate. But Song Li and Mary discover that people who see their guardian angels have their guardians fade away after a while. And in a dangerous attempt to fight his fear of heights, Ian's guardian fades away, and Mark must help him get across a pole high in the air without his guardian.

episodes.name: The Uninvited
episodes.overview: A young boy called Ben goes out searching for his lost dog and he goes through a wormhole to another dimension and finds his dog in this dimension. He ran home to find a woman and a girl claiming that the dog was theirs. But because something from another dimension was in that dimension, the world begins to be swallowed up. To save the world in both dimensions, Ben, Mark and Song Li have to retrive the dog.

episodes.name: Face Value
episodes.overview: After a girl walks away from a car crash unharmed with two hurt people in the car, someone is tracking her down and trying to find her. The Powers team try to investigate what is with this girl and why she is being tracked by an unknown group of people.

episodes.name: In the Loop
episodes.overview: Mark and Mary go to a farm where a plane mysteriously went out of contact for a while and then came back in contact later on. While out in the yard, the farm's owner, Neil Goodson, digs up a rock and the five people on the farm are sent back in time to when Mark and Mary were invited into the house. Mark and the owner's daughter, Becky, notice the time loop, and if they don't stop the loop in time, time could destroy everyone on the farm.

episodes.name: Future Box
episodes.overview: Mark becomes one of the first people to try out a new machine called the Future Box, which tells his possible future. He is told not to meddle with the future because he will end up stuck there if he wants to stay there forever. Unfortunately, he makes contact with his older self and gets stuck in the future, and unable to get out because of his longing to stay. Outside of the future, Song Li, Mary, Prof. Powers and Prof. Dixon discover that Mark is going through troubles because his pulse is going out of control. Song Li must get into Mark's future to stop the future from crashing down and destroying the younger Mark.

episodes.name: The Future Is Yours
episodes.overview: It's Mark's birthday and to celebrate it, Mark, Song Li, Mary and the Professor go to a soccer ground where an FA cup was won and where the cup still stays. Tyrone Lewis is a boy can tell the future and he senses that Mark and Song Li will steal the cup. But Mark and Song Li aren't going to steal the cup. Someone else is, and to find out, Tyrone must change the future that he sensed.
